title: Aspen Extreme [1993] DVDrip (Peter Berg)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0106315/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0106315/</a>

Good story about a strong friendship that survives temptation, competition, drugs, wealth, seduction and perhaps death. Two guys looking for adventure go to Aspen to work as ski instructors. Great skiing locations. Peter Berg in one of his first feature films. Also a very young William McNamara as 'skiing Santa' towards the end.

Good stereo sound, widescreen. Burn tested, runs well in my divX player. 113 min.

XviD 512x368 two-pass, AC3
